title: Typerepublic: new website
content:
Submitted by [ab](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135728/http:/www.typophile.com/user/12300 "View user profile.") : 15.Oct.2008 9.29am 

Typerepublic font foundry proudly announces the releasing of its new website and invites you to visit it at: [http://www.typerepublic.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135728/http:/www.typerepublic.com/ "http://www.typerepublic.com")

Typerepublic is a small independent type foundry based in Barcelona, Spain. It offers custom and retail typefaces with a local flavour (as far as the global world allows it) and high quality standards (according to technology).
author: ab
